channel.title: Skills on Erasedpkz Repping
channel.description:
Hey i downloaded erasedpkz ,but idk how to do the skills?Does anyone know how to actually level them up?The ones i need are [b] Herblore [/b] [b] Runecrafting [/b] And [b] Farming [/b]
So yeah if anyone knows how to level them up. Also,in firemaking,the fire doesnt appear.How do i fix this?

item.title: Skills on Erasedpkz Repping
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

look in server-model-players-skills and see whats there, for the fire you need to add the gfx, anim, and object

Read full topic
